text:
Lokasi
Hotel ini terletak di tengah kota, sangat strategis di pinggir jalan bersebelahan dengan Daima Hotel dan berseberangan dengan Gedung Bank Indonesia Sumbar. Menariknya, hotel ini dekat dengan pusat oleh-oleh Rohana Kudus (tidak memiliki cabang) yang terkenal dengan balado kentang teri petai - nya.

Room
Setiba di kamar masih berbau cat dan semen. Kamar cukup kecil dan tidak ada lemari namun hanya ada gantungan baju saja. Aminities standar bahkan minim: sandal hanya satu sangat tipis, pasta gigi hanya satu, dan tempat sampah hanya satu di kamar, tidak ada di kamar mandi. Selain itu juga tidak ada handuk lap tangan dan fasilitas teh kopi di kamar. Namun meskipun jendela kamar kecil dan tidak bisa terbuka lebar, view dari kamar sangat bagus yaitu kota dan pegunungan.

Makanan
Makanan di hotel ini sangat sederhana dan tidak terlalu banyak varian. Namun pelayanan selama di resto sangat baik dan ramah.

Service
Pelayanan selama di hotel ini cukup baik dan staf ramah. Harga corporate saat menginap yaitu 420.000 IDR dengan deposit 30.000 IDR. Namun kurang nyaman ketika kami sudah booking satu kamar dan sudah beli tiket pesawat namun ditelepon pihak hotel apakah kamar yang kami pesan jadi diambil dan diberi limit hingga jam 7 pm (dengan alasan hotel penuh dan amsih banyak peminatnya) sedangkan flight kami delay sehingga datang bisa lebih telat. Agak mengecewakan seperti tidak percaya kepada konsumen apalagi kami dari corporate. Akhirnya kami konfirmasi keterlambatan kedatangan, yang seharusnya tidak terlalu perlu untuk dilakukan untuk hotel yang profesional.
title: Expres and Budget Hotel

text:
Staying at Amaris won't be my choice actually. 
But, this is the nearest hotel by my journey back from Solok. And, since I have a very serious stomachache and such a very long trip, I just said yes to stay here.
All I need is bed only.

Well, I only stay the night, and I found that this hotel should be better. Here's my review about Amaris Hotel Padang.

¤ Location
They have a good location to find. It is next to Daima Hotel and across Bank Indonesia Padang. 

¤ Price
My team asked me if I wanted to stay here since the price is cheaper than my previous hotel (which I don't mind actually). This hotel is new in town, I heard it's just opened about a month. So, I think I got a promo price. I took a standard room (maybe) with a single bed and costs me about IDR 425.000 and IDR 50.000 for deposit.

¤ Room
It's a simple yet minimalist design. The room itself is not that big, a standard budget hotel. There's a work desk, LED TV, safe box, hanger corner to hang your clothes. Shower is available in the bathroom. Their cleanliness is good. After all, the room is okay for me.

¤ Services
It took such a long time to check in. I'm a bit disappointed that the receptionist gave me a different number of room. It caused me to a wrong room, the guest was opened the door feeling disturbed. At the time, I was in terrible stomachache. Also, they haven't room service. So, when I asked receptionist if I could borrow a spoon, they answered I should take it by myself at the ground floor. If I was in my best condition, it'll be okay. But, since my stomach is in pain, that's a little bit disappointing to me.
title: Standard yet Confusing

text:
Hi! All I stayed here on 5th - 6th and 9th - 11th August 2018.

The hotel room is cozy, bed is clean and comfy... plus Aircon is AAA 👍👍👍. On top of this,... TV have cable channel means you will be entertain. Variety of channel available from sport to news to movies. 

Toiletries is well provided, with in room sandal, toothbrush and clean, fluffy towel and have endless hot water shower. The good air suction in the toilet also a plus point as you do your toilet business, your partner will not event smell or hear it. 

The room only access with key card same as the lift where you are going up to ur respective floor. Their security is safe.

In short the hotel is good. But the front counter staff is not so efficient. I book 3 months earlier for two single bed in a room  yet when I checked in, they gave me a queen size bed. 😤

Morning breakfast are variety of foods with scramble egg upon order. You can find porridge too and toast bread with spreads. 

So again all and all.... it’s a good hotel with 10 floor of rooms. But the hotel surrounding don’t have shops or amenities to walk to. For food and shops you gotta commute. We end up hire a vehicle with driver to go around Padang. 

If you have extra Rp100.000 I suggest go for next door hotel call Daima Hotel. As I didn’t stay there... it seems like they have a swimming pool ( Amaris don’t have pool) and every floor there have a lobby for guest. My next visit will be definitely staying there.
title: It’s a standalone and good facilities hotel in Padang.
